remarks: A cancellation law for division.  ( ~ divcan3 analog.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2015.)
statement:
dvrass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
dvrass.o $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
dvrass.d $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
dvrass.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
dvrcan3 $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B /\ Y e. U ) -> ( ( X .x. Y ) ./ Y ) = X ) $.
